title: Getting Started with the Emoji Component
description: This document provides instructions on setting up and using the Emoji component in your React application.
author: Anonymous

blocks.content: Before you begin, ensure you have the following:
Follow these steps to install and use the Emoji component.
Create a new file named `Emoji.tsx` in the `src` directory of your React application and copy the following code into it:
To use the Emoji component, follow these steps:

Open the `src/App.tsx` file.
Import the Emoji component at the top of the file.
import{Emoji}from './Emoji'; // Adjust the path if necessary
You can now use the Emoji component in your JSX like this:
You have successfully set up and used the Emoji component in your React application. Customize it further as needed!
